dct_title_s: Greece : Map of Athens / Published by the National Tourist Organization-Athens. (Athens)
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by contours, hachures, gradient tints, spot heights. Index to excursions in Attica and places of interest in Athens. Map of Athens not drawn to scale. Recto: Map of Athens approximately 1:8,600. Relief shown by contours and hachures. Verso: Map of Attica 1:200,000. Relief shown by gradient tints and spot heights. Index on recto includes railway stations, public squares, monuments, museums, Byzantine churches, churches, modern buildings, clubs, archaeological institutes, gardens and walks, hotels. Inside cover includes tourist information : "Excursions in Attica." "No. 2 - 20.000 - 1-1-54."
